com.rexsl.test

Interface Wire

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAuthWire, CookieOptimizingWire, OneMinuteWire, RetryWire, UserAgentWire, VerboseWire

    @Immutable
public interface Wire
    Wire.

    An instance of this interface can be used in Request#through(Class) to decorate an existing wire, for example: 

     String html = new JdkRequest("http://google.com")
   .through(VerboseWire.class)
   .through(RetryWire.class)
   .header("Accept", "text/html")
   .fetch()
   .body();

    Every Wire decorator passed to through() method wraps a previously existing one.

    Since:
    0.9
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
